pageContext.claim: “With Mexico being one of the highest crime Nations in the world, we must have THE WALL. Mexico will pay for it through reimbursement/other.”
pageContext.analysis: A leaked transcript of Trump's phone call with Mexican President Enrique Pena Nieto shows Trump knows Mexico will not pay for the wall. Trump told Pena Nieto: "I am willing to say that we will work it out, but that means it will come out in the wash and that is okay. But you cannot say anymore that the United States is going to pay for the wall."
